title: The 1975 filmed illegally smoking 'cigarette' underneath table at the Brit Awards after picking up Best British Band gong
text:
The 1975 filmed illegally smoking 'cigarette' underneath table at the Brit Awards after picking up Best British Band gong The video was posted on Instagram by one of the band's members Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now The 1975 caught secretly SMOKING under BRITs table! The 1975 were caught hiding under a table and smoking at the Brit Awards last night. 
A video of band members Matthew Healy and George Daniel was posted on Instagram by bass player Ross MacDonald. 
In the clip, the band's frontman and drummer can be seen crouching underneath a table and puffing on what appears to be a cigarette. 
George passes it to Matthew who turns around and puts his hand up to the camera when he realises he's being filmed. Read More Are they smoking a cigarette? (Photo: Instagram/rass1975) They took to the stage to perform at the ceremony 
The camera then pans from underneath the table to show the inside of the O2 Arena, London, where the ceremony is still ongoing. 
A performance has just ended and the crowd is cheering, and at that point, Matthew jumps up from underneath the table to join his fellow audience members in applause. 
Ross posted the video on Instagram, alongside the caption: "@brits LOL". 
Their fans seemed very impressed by the band's actions. Matthew realises they're being filmed (Photo: Instagram/rass1975) They won Best British Band (Photo: PA) 
One wrote: "this is why i love this band" 
"Legends only," wrote another. 
The video was also posted by somebody on Twitter, who wrote: "catch the 1975 smoking spliffs under a table during the #BRITs2017 how about that ?" 
The poster suggested that they were smoking "spliffs" and not just normal cigarettes, but this is unclear. 
"They are so f**king cool," wrote another. Their fans thought they were cool (Photo: ITV) One fan called them "legends" (Photo: ITV) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
